items.title: Installed last30days Skill
items.description: Reddit + X research skill. Configured OpenAI + xAI API keys. Tested with Clawdbot use cases search.

items.title: Mission Control: Daily Logs Viewer
items.description: Added Daily Logs section with date picker sidebar and markdown rendering. Auto-syncs from memory/.

items.title: Mission Control: Font/Spacing Tightened
items.description: Reduced font sizes, tightened spacing per Nam's feedback. Sidebar 240px, nav 14px, tables 14px.

items.title: Telegram Privacy Mode Disabled
items.description: Configured bot to see all group messages without @mention

items.title: Cron Jobs Adjusted to HKT
items.description: Daily summary + transcript archive moved to 11pm HKT (7am PST) while Nam in Hong Kong

items.title: Night Shift: Marriott Scanner Skill
items.description: Built Playwright-based scanner with 80+ hotel database across 9 cities. Generates MMP promo links.

items.title: Night Shift: Market Research
items.description: Compiled market analysis: Tech selloff (MSFT -12%), VIX +6.8%, energy/commodities up. Apple earnings tonight.

items.title: Mission Control Dashboard
items.description: Activity tracker to see everything Alfred is working on
items.prd: A single dashboard showing all active work, completed tasks, ideas, and system status. Includes Tools & APIs page, Cron Jobs page, and Daily Logs viewer.

items.title: Strategy Tracker App
items.description: Trading dashboard with P&L by strategy: Earnings, BX-Trender, Premium/Wheels, Ethan's Trades
items.blocked: Need VRP and Ethan specs from Nam
items.prd: Track P&L per trading strategy. Each strategy gets its own page with custom metrics. Earnings: EV/trade, Premium Capture %, Win Rate by Structure. BX-Trender: 8 key metrics. Premium/Wheels: Theta Efficiency, Assignment Rate. Risk metrics: Sharpe, Sortino, Profit Factor, Expectancy.

items.title: MandarinFlow / DailyLingo
items.description: Chinese learning app with phrase-based spaced repetition

items.title: Schwab Trading Permissions
items.description: Enable trading scope on Schwab developer app to place trades via API
items.blocked: Need to request trading permissions in Schwab Developer Portal

items.title: VRP Strategy
items.description: Nam mentioned as a trading strategy - need definition. Volatility Risk Premium?

items.title: Ethan's Trades
items.description: A trader Nam follows - biotech + mixed. Need to know: who, what platform, trade style

tools.name: Schwab API
tools.description: Market data API for quotes and options chains. Auto-refreshes OAuth token every 25 minutes.
tools.note: Trading permissions need to be enabled in Developer Portal

tools.name: OpenAI API
tools.description: GPT models for web search and research. Used by last30days skill for Reddit research.

tools.name: xAI API
tools.description: Grok models for X/Twitter search. Used by last30days skill for real-time X research.

tools.name: Oura Ring API
tools.description: Health data from your Oura ring: sleep quality, HRV, readiness score, heart rate, activity.

tools.name: Twitter/X API
tools.description: Read-only access to @Nam_Le timeline, mentions, and search. Can monitor tweets but cannot post.

tools.name: Brave Search API
tools.description: Web search engine API. Used for real-time web searches, news, and research queries.

tools.name: Alpha Vantage API
tools.description: Free stock market data: quotes, historical prices, earnings calendar. 25 requests/day limit.

tools.name: AgentMail
tools.description: AI-friendly email service. Primary email: alfred-x@agentmail.to.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: Code hosting and version control. Using worldcash1 account for repos.

tools.name: ElevenLabs
tools.description: AI text-to-speech with natural voices. Used for voice messages and TTS features.

tools.name: Telegram Bot
tools.description: Primary communication channel. Privacy mode disabled for group chat visibility.

tools.name: Vercel
tools.description: Web hosting platform. Auto-deploys Mission Control from GitHub.
